sentences.en: I think that's my Blackberry beeping.
sentences.cn: 我想那是我的黑莓手机在响。

sentences.en: All BlackBerry data traffic passes through one of these centers.
sentences.cn: 所有的黑莓数据流量都要经过其中一个中心。

sentences.en: I also had the first BlackBerry because I was still working in dispatch at the time.
sentences.cn: 我也有了第一部黑莓手机，因为那时我还在忙调度的事情。
